description: Boss Woman is an initiative by the NGO APPB, Asociación Protección Vulnerable, aimed at empowering vulnerable women, particularly migrants, through a structured program. It offers psychological support via group therapy, educational resources on human rights and feminism, and practical training in livelihoods, including financial education. Participants can choose from modules on employability, entrepreneurship, or food security, fostering personal growth and self-sufficiency among women who have faced significant challenges.
name: Boss Woman
